website_summaries.verdict: A highly affordable, multi-purpose device that is a must-have in emergency situations.
pros: Durable clip is included with alarm, so you can easily attach it to your bag or belt loop
There is a built-in LED flashlight for emergencies
The compact and intuitive design is easy for everyone to use
Alarm is loud enough to raise heads in a parking lot
cons: Lanyard could potentially get caught on a number of things and unexpectedly sound the alarm

customer_reviews.title: This alarm is a simple and quick way to attract attention to you to call 911 or help you .
customer_reviews.text: Product is what it says it is... built real good.... easy to use and have close by you.... you can also be ready to use alarm if you see potential danger and scare off anyone if you suspect someone seems threatening to you..... also like the lite that comes with it.... nice for when you are unlocking your door at night..... also alarm might scare some animals away when you are camping out or hiking...
customer_reviews.author: david carlson

customer_reviews.title: Add another layer to your personal security
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife and daughter to have with them when they go anywhere. I'm thinking of carrying one myself and if the need arises to sound the alarm and maybe even toss it a few feet to distract the threat while I reach for pepper spray or my 9mm depending on the threat. It would be an unexpected distraction for the threat. If it causes him to run, great! If he reaches for it to shut it off, he gets hosed with law-enforcement grade pepper spray or shot as a last resort.
customer_reviews.author: alfisch

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: These five personal alarms work well. I tested each one. I hold each alarm face down in my hand to muffle to the noise, then pull the cord out, hear the alarm, and reattach the cord (and the noise stops). Easy for me. I like that the alarm turns off only if the cord is reattached to the device. I can pull the cord and throw the alarm away from me, allowing for the sound to continue until the stranger leaves. Having five alarms allows us to have an alarm in different locations in our car, on our person or around our house (such as in the garage).
customer_reviews.author: Dads Home

customer_reviews.title: good price, easy to operate, loud
customer_reviews.text: I tested these with earplugs in and the noise they put out was ear-spliting. I have not had to use these in an emergency, but I feel better about having a level of protection. If anyone tries to steal my purse, they will also lose their hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary I

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive device that truly offers a priceless degree of protection for those you love
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a simple device that does not require any special training or incur any fear for those afraid of wielding a knife or gun. This is great for teenagers, women, anyone who wants something that can effectively detour an attack. I bought several and equipped the women in my family as well as my business. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Ira C Robinson II, MD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stocking stuffer idea!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a multipack of these personal alarms for myself, my daughters, my sister, and my mother (tween thru 75 yo grandma). All age ranges find them very practical and easy to use. The flashlight is surprisingly bright for such a small item. The alarms are incredibly loud and ear piercing. We've attached them to purses, belt loops, or just carried them while walking alone (or in small groups). They are simple to activate - and simple to silence. Hopefully they will never be needed, but I do have a better sense of security (for myself and my loved ones!) I think these would be awesome stocking stuffers for anyone (male or female!) who has habits of walking alone.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SECURITY ALARM
customer_reviews.text: Great product, we feel much safer having it with us. Would definitely recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Alarming alarms !! No sounds !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first alarm ceased to work after one week. I wrote and I think was answered that I would get a new one but I am still waiting. And now I am nervous that they will all break. I thought it was being taken care of but I haven’t heard a word.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Wow. Talk about an ear piercing sound...
customer_reviews.text: It made me almost jump out of my shoes when I first heard it. This sound is so abrasive to the ears that the first inclination one has is to get as far away from it as quickly as possible. And that's the exact kind of reaction I would want from a potential predator. For such a little price tag this alarm sure packs a big punch. And the flashlight is a bonus. It is very bright.
customer_reviews.author: JuJu

customer_reviews.title: Discourage Perpetrators & Draw Attention!
customer_reviews.text: I feel much safer when I am walking alone in a parking lot or parking garage with this noise device. This will discourage perpetrators!! It helps draw attention to the action at hand, and is so loud that anyone trying to grab you will likely leave. Remeber “P&C” (dont let perpetrators get Privacy & Control).
customer_reviews.author: freshspirit

customer_reviews.title: Nice small, but loud personal alarm.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for walking my dog at night. Just a little extra safety precaution. To activate, just pull the pin attached to the nylon handle. It's not as loud as advertised, but it's loud enough and annoying. I'm sure any of my neighbors would definitely hear that if it went off.
customer_reviews.author: OfficiallyPatty

customer_reviews.title: Far better than i would have thought
customer_reviews.text: this thing is very loud. perfect for a keychain. cheap and effective for someone who isnt comfortable with a taser or firearm
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: does not work
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my family in November 2018 and now in March I went to pull it and it did not work I changed the batteries and still nothing. Not happy with product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A personal alarm everyone should have
customer_reviews.text: This Personal Alarm Siren Song is something I have been looking for, for a long time. In the mornings when I leave for work it is pretty dark. My neighborhood is pretty safe but I have always wanted some kind of alarm in the event I felt unsafe. I ordered this - tested it and it is amazing. Will be ordering a few for my nieces!
customer_reviews.author: Aneert

customer_reviews.title: Great personal alarm
customer_reviews.text: Great personal alarm!!! Very light weight, small and easy to use. Extremely loud! Even took it with me when jogging in the canyon (to scare of the coyotes).
customer_reviews.author: asaf&mor

customer_reviews.title: Get wanted attention
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my elderly parent. When you need to get someone's attention, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: electrogizmo

customer_reviews.title: Small but very powerful. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I plan to buy two more of these for my younger siblings. The alarm sound is magnificent and very loud. The LED lighting is also on point too. I love it. I also love that the company emails you personally. Makes you feel even more assured about their services.
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: No purse should be without one. You won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Thornton

customer_reviews.title: TRUSTED PERSONAL ALARM!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased several other brand personal alarms that I had given to friends who work late in not the best of neighborhoods, so when I decided to purchase a personal alarm for myself, all my questions were answered plus in receiving an email from the CEO of SLFORCE after my purchase, I was appreciative of the personal attention but also stood behind this product. I plan to test it out this week and will have it attached to my keychain.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: No good for your family
customer_reviews.text: These iteams does not work as it should. No sound when you pull out the steam . Wast of your money y’all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Smith

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the volume. Sounds like a dying animal.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Personal Alarm - Not This Product
customer_reviews.text: Chirping alarm sounded weak and certainly not much of a deterrent to anyone with malicious intent. Light is nice and powerful, the only positive comment I could make about this product. My wife, grown daughters and husbands laughed at the thought of ever using this as a defensive option. My advice: Shop for a small air horn. That would be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOUD but Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These are really simple little gadgets that pump out A LOT of noise. But they are flimsy and feel cheap. The key chain part of mine is broken where it connects to the fob and I’m fairly positive a few good stomps would destroy one but haven’t tested the theory. I’ve also had mine go off on accident from the pin being pulled out more than a few times. I gave one to my step sister and one to her daughter because it is something you can have in a school where we live. But I stopped carrying mine in lieu of a stun gun (partly because without the key chain I didn’t really have a way to carry it).
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: You need both hands to activate...one to hold unit and one to pull cord. Not very good if holding an umbrella or ?
customer_reviews.author: Gramx4

customer_reviews.title: Two of the five units arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Two of the little key-chain alarm units didn't work at all - no alarm, no flashlight. Very disappointing especially because there's no battery compartment so a dead unit is irreversibly dead. So I paid for five but only got three that work.
customer_reviews.author: Rod R. Surratt

customer_reviews.title: Legal Self Defense in California
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife. Living in California you are so limited on what you can have for self defense yet the criminals. This will give her the element of surprise and gain attention. It is loud! Contains everything to have your loved one protected immediately. Shipping was fast and customer service will be in touch to insure it arrived safely and everything is going well....what other company contacts you to make sure your happy with their product? I feel better with my wife carrying it...and have ordered more for my daughter and sisters.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Safety Is Important To Us All
customer_reviews.text: I got this item in a package of 5 as I wanted to try and keep my family safe. Where they live and when when they travel at least I know they have some kind of protection if they ever run into trouble. These days anything that can draw attention to you when you are in trouble is good and my family have tried it out and find the 130dB would definitely alert anyone who is is trouble and by them sometimes to get to safety. They are so thankful that I purchased it so they could all be a little bit safer.
customer_reviews.author: Janet O.

customer_reviews.title: Best personal alarm
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought works with compressed air and is loud, but too big and it's belt clip was not secure. On the other hand, your alarm is smaller, and comes with a carabiner to clip on the belt. It has a small lanyard you can pull if you feel threatened, and doing so sets off a very loud alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough to deter anyone or summon help
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly loud enough. The alarm would fade into the background noise of most cities, and ignored like a car alarm. The device is also a little big. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: J951L

customer_reviews.title: They are all the same just find the cheaper on...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of this alarm siren (26 total) so I decided to split to two sellers. They are exactly the same ONLY that SL put their logo on it. I tested all of it. One from SL force doesn't work but I feel lazy in returning it. I need to buy some more because my friends love it but I'll get it from the other vendor where it's a little bit cheaper and each one comes with its own tiny boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Ligaya Pado

customer_reviews.title: Loudv and easy to use...not defensive obviously
customer_reviews.text: It's handy...easy to use..and loud. Very startling...will it deter an attacker? I don't really want to find out...but out did scare the crap out of me and you can hear it from a great distance
customer_reviews.author: cperr05

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Reassuring
customer_reviews.text: Due to a past trauma, I've been looking for a personal alarm for emergencies. I refuse to be helpess next time. The alarms are pretty loud. It will definitely surprise an attacker. I appreciate the caribeeners included so I can clip it onto my keys easily. I was excited to find this pack so I can also give one to the other important women in my life. This was a small price to pay for some piece of mind. I had already attached the blue one to my keys when I took this picture. I taped the strap to the back of mine so it doesn't accidentally go off in public.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy Shauers

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: 3 of them stopped working about 2 weeks ago, right around the closing window to return that sucks.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn harrington

customer_reviews.title: Loved enough to grab attention within 50 feet
customer_reviews.text: Loved enough to grab attention within 50 feet. Hangs on my keychain and is part of my self defense arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: everyone loved it, even the teachers
customer_reviews.text: i have two teenagers, two girls 16 and 14 and they feel safer now that they got that tiny alarm that makes a lot of noise!!!!!! they brought it to school, it is a girls school. i am sure you could imagine what happened next. everyone loved it, even the teachers. its a girls school with 700 students:) i hope the seller has enought of it:):) it is a MUST buy !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device ... Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two alarms; one for my 18 yr old daughter and one for her best friend. They loved it and immediately clipped the alarm to their purse. The device is very well made, the design is sleek and it is the perfect size. The alarm is very loud, easy to activate and should scare away any potential attacker.
customer_reviews.author: azhapi

customer_reviews.title: Loud af
customer_reviews.text: Works well! There has been some suspicious activity in my area lately so I'm prepared! Better safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Crys Sal

customer_reviews.title: Personal Alarm
customer_reviews.text: These are OK. The alarm is very loud, which is what you want. However, pin does come out a little too easily. It came out in my purse a few times. It is hard to put it back in and stop the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works well!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this personal alarm. it was purchased for my high school age granddaughter to carry to and from school. The sound is loud enough to attract attention. I am also please with the seller. The alarm was received in a timely manner and the seller contacted me to see if I was happy with the purchase and delivery. Very good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: B. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Protect your family, everybody needs this personal alarm device.
customer_reviews.text: The 5 pak is a great value. We tested all the alarms and they will blow you away. My wife and others now have one if needed when jogging or going in and out of the house. Sad you need one but you have to do something for yourself, get these.
customer_reviews.author: loveamazon

customer_reviews.title: Small and loud
customer_reviews.text: I like that my kids are cool with keeping them with them. They aren't like the one my mom got me when I was young. They were huge and embarrassing. My son's friends asked about them so we discussed the importance of personal safety and how this can be a help. They really wanted to hear it so I covered the speaker, because we were in a school, and pulled the chord and quickly replaced it. They were surprised at how loud it was even with the speaker covered. I feel more confident with my kids being out and around when they have them and I have one too.
customer_reviews.author: Byrd Lady

customer_reviews.title: Personal Alarm Siren - Best Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I want to order more Personal Alarms. I gave the alarms to friends. We tested them and we feel safe now! My friend posted a photo on Facebook of her walking her puppy Diesel. This is what she said: "Thank you CC 🙏 Diesel and I felt very safe during our walk today 🐾
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who’s new to riding the bus and walking a block to get home after school. Told him to sound the alarm if anyone tries to kidnap or hurt him. Also told him that it calls the police so he doesn’t pull it for fun.
customer_reviews.author: fancouple

customer_reviews.title: Not as loud as I expected
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a very scary experience - was out late at night walking my dog and out of nowhere a tall thin man wearing a hoodie was standing next to me - I couldn't do anything; I froze. He walked around me and up the street and went into a house. So I bought your device and have it attached to my dog's leash. I was surprised when I tested it that it wasn't anywhere as loud as I expected it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Only 90 decibels
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and will be returning it. I tried two of the units, and while it does make a sudden loud sound, it didn't seem loud enough to be a genuine deterrent. I tested it with two different decibel monitors, and it is only 90 dB. About 2/3 the level advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lcmmd3

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem very loud.
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm not sure how loud these are supposed to be , but after testing it in my closed bedroom it really didn't seem loud enough to draw attention from a good radius if I needed to use it. 3 stars due to the item info making it seem like this product produce a lot more sound then it actually does.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: ... personal alarm for a long time and I'm so glad I finally did it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting to get a personal alarm for a long time and I'm so glad I finally did it. This little alarm is SUPER loud!
customer_reviews.author: Josef

customer_reviews.title: Loud and proud worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as Christmas gifts for my family have a granddaughter in college and daughters to jog on a regular basis they arrived quickly in good shape and they all bought these as Christmas gifts for my family have a granddaughter in college and daughters to jog on a regular basis they arrive quickly in good shape and the Alarm is loud and very effective my neighbors came over to check on me after I had tested the ones that I had gotten well worth the money for the number of alarms I got and I feel safer with my family caring them
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Saved me!
customer_reviews.text: It helped me save myself while three guys violently tried to rob me of my scooter in the night. I wore it attached to my bra, thanks to the big hook. When receiving punches while lying on my back on the ground and holding the scooter between my legs, i managed to pull the cord. And got the attention of nearby security guards. The guys gave up and left. The noise is very loud. The safety pin is quite easy to pull. Just make sure you are able to reach it easily, because when your under stress, things get difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Bli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great peice!! Alarm is super super loud and will feel so much safer now! Completely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: chaya

customer_reviews.title: Its really loud
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and I'm using it because I'm older 65 year old lady that needs to feel protected
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this alarm for my wife when she is out and I can't be with her. This alarm will definitely get the attention of other people in her vicinity if she is attacked. Hopefully, she will never have to use it and we both feel better that she has it.
customer_reviews.author: xjag33

customer_reviews.title: Personal alarm
customer_reviews.text: Well I'll never be quite sure how effective but this was a good buy and I was able to give one to each of my family . If nothing else it will startle someone maybe just enough to give you time to get to safety. My daughter also has a pepper spray but in some instances she is not allowed to have it on her, this she can. So for me its a win.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W

customer_reviews.title: I got these to give to a friend
customer_reviews.text: I have an elderly friend who was being harassed by her daughter's ex. She was frightened. She had heard about these types of fobs but thought they were too expensive and that she would never be able to work one in an emergency. So I bought a box of 5 of these. I gave her 2 one for her and one for her daughter. She was so grateful and she felt so much safer. These are amazing. I gave one to my daughter who takes college classes at night, one to my son (the black one) who delivers food early, early in the morning. Both are extremely grateful. These are so easy to use and so frightening when deployed!
customer_reviews.author: Alison A

customer_reviews.title: REALLY LOUD!!
customer_reviews.text: If you need to use a personal alarm you want it to be loud and this one fits the bill for sure! Also, their customer service is tops. One of my alarms had a very weak sound even tho batteries were perfect and they sent me a new one quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Didiwi

customer_reviews.title: Loud alarm
customer_reviews.text: My husband tested all 5. They worked and had the loud sound I was expecting. I like that they are not a one time use. Replace the pin and you use it again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent=not good as a security device!
customer_reviews.text: I tested this twice upon receipt and it worked fine. The next day, when I was showing my co-workers who also leave work late at night and have to walk a couple of blocks to a field parking lot, it worked once out of seven attempts. This makes it not so much a security device but a not-so-fun toy...unless the bad guys are willing to wait for it to finally work!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product. They all worked on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. Alarm is certainly loud enough to get attention. Seems well-made and the light is very bright. Replaceable batteries is a nice feature as well. Even comes with a carabiner for attachment. Also appreciated the followup from the company making sure I was satisfied with the product AND they provided contact information if I was unhappy or had questions.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan T.

customer_reviews.title: Great safety device.
customer_reviews.text: This personal alarm is a good device to have and it is loud so if you are in trouble it will draw attention and the price is great. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline a. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Working Great! Great product
customer_reviews.text: Hi! Yes, I received them last week. All seems well. Thank you for making it right. Btw, I really like the convienance of having it on my key ring. Again, thank You! I will tell others about this great product. I feel safer having this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie A. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Safety must have
customer_reviews.text: Perfection. Really loud. I bought two. When I got them, I gave all ten to friends the week I retired (sort of going away gift). They are easy to operate, loved the led light. I even bought another two boxes and gave all but two of those to friends. It’s perfect for those women, girls, boys, elderly that might be going out early or out late in the dark (even if it’s just to the store or to your car). I talked my boss into considering using them as a Safety gift idea for employees. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GSKM in sc

customer_reviews.title: Handy light kills the battery without you realizing it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little product EXCEPT the fact that the “handy light” button gets pressed every time it is sitting in your purse, and therefore it is DEAD AND WON’T WORK WHEN YOU NEED IT. Glad I checked mine, otherwise I wouldn’t have realized it was useless after only a few months. I will be trying to find one that will actually for sure work when I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely LOUD (((SIREN))))
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!!! THIS LITTLE alarm packs a powerful sound. Just trying it out I nearly panicked listening to it's Extremely LOUD (((SIREN))))). It's going to draw attention when it's used, which is NOT what anyone who's trying to harm you wants. Also good in case an elderly person falls and needs assistance. I bought one for my mom, my daughter and daughter in law and my granddaughters, as well as myself. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Super loud!
customer_reviews.text: Super loud! We tried it just to see how loud, the only thing I worried about is the noise activation, I can imagine will got pull by accident somehow if I hang it on my Keychain along with my car keys or house key. So we just put it in our purse and have it out as need it. Maybe when we walk by our self. I like this better than the small pepper spray we have, we have to aim to the eyes, I can imagine it would be difficult from certain angle. This would certainly get people attention, very loud! Maybe just test it from time to time make sure the battery still works.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Pull the alarm one time and time to trash it
customer_reviews.text: Dislike, I accidentally pulled this alarm one time...it has been possessed to go off every since :(
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this sucker is so loud that it is actually painful to my ears. The people who say that it isn’t loud must have been to way too many concerts because their hearing is impaired. I did have to cut the fabric loop so that it wouldn’t snag on an object in my purse and then create a deafening sound while I searched frantically through for the parts. Then tied the two ends in separate knots to keep them from fraying. If I were to sound this alarm when attacked or threatened, I think it could make the perpetrator run. I honestly can’t stand being near the sound—it’s that loud.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and effective. It is very loud and if you are trying to scare someone or get attention directed towards you, this will work great. There is a pin you pull out of the device that ignites the loud noise, my issue is that it can get caught on a lot of stuff if it is on your key chain. Even twisting the pin the device screeches. This device does exactly what it is designed to do, those were my only issues with the product. I would want the device on my key chain, but because of this pin issue I cannot keep it there. Other than that it is a perfect product, hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 packs of these for Christmas. When I gave them to all the family the younger ones (21-35) loved it. Some actually tried them out in the family room (I would not advise that). Most the the girls actually placed them on their handbags. I carry one and hook it onto my coach bag. The wrist band is great. So many people liked them that I purchased a third pack. I will put them away as a future gift when I need one. Obviously, you can tell that we love them! Here's hoping that we will not actually have to use them, but when you hear the siren you will be happy to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Live Saver
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my family living in Mexico. With the violence over there they didn't have a way to protect themselves and this did just the trick. It has prevented even a robbery. It was so loud when one of my aunts activate it when her house was being robbed that one of her neighbors heard it and called the police. I'm so grateful to have purchased this that I'm looking into buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Karianne

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what you mean by “stretch”, so I didn’t rate that. However, if you meant from how far away the noise could be heard, I would say enough for our use. I bought these after an incident where I needed my husband’s help, and couldn’t get his attention. I was outside and he was inside. This will do. I figure if I need to use it I will pull the pin and toss it away from myself to protect my hearing, as these little alarms are very loud. We also keep one on each floor of our house, and in our car. Good product at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Judy's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good to have for a little piece of mind.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the box of multiple alarms to give all the young women in my life. They do a lot of business travel so I felt they should have something at their disposal should they need it. We were all surprised at how bright the flashlight is and how loud the alarm is! Hopefully, they never need to use it but it sounds plenty loud. The extra hook for purse or luggage isn’t very strong and breaks easily. But, the company’s customer service is amazing and highly responsive. I highly recommend this product and company! Amazing value! Get them for your loved ones!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jost

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to run every morning since my gym is closed due to corona. Everyday it’s been fine but I actually had a car stop in front of me and block me purposely to ask for my number. After that I felt a little uneasy about running. This thing is loud. Like ear splitting loud. So it does the job. I would’ve given it 5 stars all around but it did not arrive when it said it was going to, and that’s not ok especially when you need it for safety. I’m aware it has nothing to do with the seller, but amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: For Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I really like these little protection devices. It makes me feel safe to know if anything happens I can just pull the cord and a very loud noise will help deter the attacker. They come out of the box ready to use. It was fun choosing a color for myself. I passed the others out to my female friends because I want to help them stay safe, too. The included small carabiner clip keeps the unit safely in place on my purse or it can be attached to a belt loop. I am very pleased I was chosen to try this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ma'ly

customer_reviews.title: Very loud! Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This was the next best thing to the tracker and pepper spray that my daughter does not leave the house wothout. I worry like every parent does and we practice different ways she can be faster at using her different self defense devices and she's really made me proud how quick she learns. This was a very loud alarm. She's super fast at putting the pin back in and then going for the pepper spray. She doesn't have to really hurt anyone and have to live with it but I will if they mess with her, gladly!
customer_reviews.author: RatcliffReviews

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect, but it may wake up your neighbors.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to rig up a lock box to alert me if someone opened it. Well, this little alarm not only alerts me, but it also alerts my neighbors 1/4 mile away. If you want to scare the living daylights out of some nosy person (or just play an evil prank) then this is the device for you. It’s very very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: These personal alarms are great! The noise they make is so loud that it would deter anyone from attacking you. They are easy to clip on any bag or keychain. Super easy to use just pull the string and away it sounds. I feel protected and secure. I have given them to my friends and family and they love them too!
customer_reviews.author: Geri Lynn Novak

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the ladies in my immediate family. My niece, mom, girlfriend, her mom and my sister. They all love it and have used it in real world situations. Thankful that I thought about them and got them these devices. My niece loves it the most since she’s the most paranoid.
customer_reviews.author: James Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Ordered yesterday here today. Super shipping just what I wanted VERY loud
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the five of us going on vacation including my 9 yr old grandson. We all used ours every day on out packs, purses and belts. We did not need to activate them but we would have been able to if needed. I cannot get to this article to review them yet( I have a lit of books) but thought you would like to know that these were used every day for two weeks amd will be used again for our next trip. Thanks. Did I mention that they are also pretty?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: That I have something that is right in my hand for self protection.
customer_reviews.text: Your key chain alarm is prefect for an older or a younger person to have handy in case one needs to alert people to the danger that lerks almost everywhere now a days. One cannot be to alert as to what is happening on the streets and in buildings these days.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use/ compact/ and really LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 5 alarm pack and am very pleased. I have two granddaughters heading to college in the fall which is why I originally started looking for a small alarm that they could put on their key-chain. These were highly rated on Amazon and elsewhere. This is small, has a flashlight and is very easy to operate. The alarm is LOUD!! So impressed that I plan to order another 5 pack to give as gifts. (It comes with a delightful thank you note from the company!)
customer_reviews.author: Columbusmom

customer_reviews.title: Easy, loud and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Makes me feel safe on my walks. There are a lot of bears in my area and I think this would be a good deterrent. I gave one to all my neighbors. When working alone (up on a roof or chainsawing) it’s good to have some sort of easy loud alarm system that could alert others if you get injured. Cell phone may not be on your person but you can attach this light weight device to a belt loop and then you don’t have to think about it again.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary S

customer_reviews.title: Small, but HUGE with sound!
customer_reviews.text: So this little bugger, when you take it out of the box you'll think this is a cheap gimmick. Go ahead, and pull the strap out. You'll next begin immediately fumbling as you strive to put the pin back in to shut off the deafening noise this little thing lets out. It's comical how loud it is! What does this all mean? It gives me some satisfaction when I give to my daughter as she heads off to college this summer! Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Stauff

customer_reviews.title: Wow to alarm!
customer_reviews.text: As a senior with diminishing physical qualities, I wanted something to assist me in the event I need help due to an emergency. This alarm is really loud - don't try it in the house with your pets! So glad I purchased a bunch of these- into the stockings they go! Pricing is a great value, too !!!
customer_reviews.author: Forever Young

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what you would expect.
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it is intended to do. However, it is a bit large as a keychain. I had to take the batteries out when it was carried on a plane since having it accidentally go off during a flight would be a bit of a problem. The batteries can only be accessed by removing a screw. The carabiner that comes with each of them is not very well made but is easily and cheaply replaceable. Not sure why this as marked as sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Christmas gifts my grandmas so they could have when they are taking walks or even in their homes. and ended up giving the others to my niece and nephew's girlfriend. Needless to say, they were a HUGE hit. In fact, nephew's gf was the last one to open hers and said she'd be disappointed had she not received one. They are loud, light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: amy_ammo

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT PURCHASE AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: I thought the big round button was what you press in the event of an emergency, well it’s not. You have to pull the pin out and if it gets caught on your purse or clothing, guess what, the alarm is going to sound wherever you are. Hopefully not at work. It actually happened to me😩
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and loud!
customer_reviews.text: I got a 5 pack, gave 1 to each of my 2 kids who are in middle school. I kept 1. I also gave one to my mom. My mom has a flashlight that doubles as a stun-gun, but she's scared to use it. I don't think my kids are ready to carry mace. This personal alarm is the best for ease of use. No one meaning anyone harm is going to stick around when this thing sounds off. People are going to notice, they're going to look, and that's the last thing a criminal wants. I wish I would have gotten these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Jil Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this personal protection alarm. It is very loud and shrill and would call attention to whomever was holding it. I have 3. I walk to public transportation in the early morning and have it ready. I also keep one by my bed and one in the living room next to the door. I wish I would have had it when someone tried to break down my door when I was home. It is easy to use just pull out the plug and easy to put the plug back in. The cost is very low for a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: katies mom

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: Don't leave home without it. It stay on my Keychain or latched to my belt when I walk out my house. It's a very loud sound almost like a fire alarm. Sure to draw attention. Very easy to use/activate and just as easy to quiet. Also has a mini led light which I use when walking my dog. If we were in the middle of the zombie apocalypse this would definitely draw the hoard your way!
customer_reviews.author: Damond

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this for the price and quality. Exactly what I wanted. I attached it to my key ring and felt safe as I drove across country by myself with my dog. The sound level of the alarm is piercingly perfect! So much so that when my dog was charged by a dog at the dog park I triggered the alarm and the attack dog ran off. The flashlight feature is great too. Very handy device!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Mealey power

customer_reviews.title: Ward off attackers
customer_reviews.text: Personal safety for my teens & mom are high priority. Whether walking day or night, going to and from a vehicle day or night, this easy to use, hand held, pocket Sz, bag clip optional, device is fantastic. When the pin is pulled the sound is loud enough to ward off attackers and attract those able to come help. The sound continues until the pin is put back in place. PLUS it has a push button to activate the flashlight feature. Perfect for seeing the locks on a home door or vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: familyguide

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it broke.
customer_reviews.text: It went off unexpectedly and had to stomp on it to shut off.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Adams

customer_reviews.title: over rated doesn`t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: When you pull the pin indoors its pretty loud but outside where you really need it, its not very loud at all!!! Saw a coyote by my car pull pin he just stared at me!! Didn`t bother him at all. product not any value if its not loud enough outdoors!!
customer_reviews.author: Kdog

customer_reviews.title: Personal alarm siren
customer_reviews.text: These 5 alarms arrived so quickly and were packaged very well. I tested all 5 and they all work perfectly. My daughter and I go to Vegas often and I'm thrilled to have these personal sirens to take along with us on our next trip this month. I love the colors, too. I was very pleased to also receive 5 clips that will make these easy to carry on purse, carry-on or back pack. I would highly recommend these personal sirens for anyone who often walks alone or is in crowded situations where it's so easy to be grabbed.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: CRAZY LOUD !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It certainly is very loud and will drive away an unwanted sane person with good hearing. There is one major problem- it is so loud you’re own ear drums will slap back and forth in your head and damage your own hearing. You’ll be safe but need hearing aides . My ears hurt for hours with only a 25 second test. I was buying this for my daughter and new born granddaughter . She’s afraid it will damage her hearing and won’t use it .
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Loud for sure
customer_reviews.text: Love the small size and ease of use. I think it's best if used in a pocket or attached to a belt loop. I would think if you put it on a purse and your purse (heaven forbid) is snatched won't do you much good. I bought the 5 pack will probably buy more, kept one and gave them to some family members and now I want more for more family and friends!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Safety always comes first
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the personal alarms for my granddaughter who is going to College and my daughters. received the alarms and tested them; unfortunately some came in with low to no battery power. I contacted the distributor and without hesitation got a new batch. These ones came top of the line and perform as advertise. Did a night test with my granddaughter out in a parking lot and could hear the alarm from a distance quite clear. Love the product and the reliability of service provided. Think Safety first.
customer_reviews.author: David Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Personal Body Alarm
customer_reviews.text: When the package arrived and I took it out of the bag it was mailed in, I was impressed at the packaging. It looked like something you would find in a high end store. We wanted to test the product so we carried them out around the lake. They were very loud, clear and you would not worry about scaring someone off if you were attacked and had it on you. I feel safer knowing how well they work. Great item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Conwill

customer_reviews.title: Personal Alarm Siren Song
customer_reviews.text: This product is on my keychain..I will use it as an attention seeker if I fear for my safety...I always carry my keys in my hand and purse on shoulder when in a public place..The alarm has a pin that is also attached not only to siren but also wrist carrier so it is very simple to pull it and immediately A LOUD SIREN WILL GO OFF. Personally I have not used it, except to test siren...It will definitely be heard. I purchased for my daughter, sister , niece and mom...great stocking stuffer or gift...
customer_reviews.author: Linda A Donohue

customer_reviews.title: Their Very Loud!
customer_reviews.text: EDITED......SLFORCE fixed their website so it is NOW SECURE! .......These are very good and well made. The flashlight is also very bright. When you receive them there is a little envelope offering you a free gift for buying them. The website won’t go through and comes up as NOT SECURE. So this company needs to either fix it, or have you go to their direct website to pick a gift!
customer_reviews.author: My Bella

product_meta.title: SLFORCE Personal Alarm Siren Song - 130dB Safesound Personal Alarms for Women Keychain with LED Light, Emergency Self Defense for Kids & Elderly. Security Sound Whistle Safety Siren (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

YOUR FAMILY'S SAFETY IS OUR TOP PRIORITY!

Is your teenager out late at night while you're home worried sick?

Are you afraid of being attacked by assailants, rapists or dogs?

Do you want to enjoy your walks around the city without worrying about your safety?

Do you like jogging early in the morning or late at night but you’re afraid of strangers?



You never know when a situation can get dangerous. But you can be ready for it.
Unfortunately, many victims are too traumatized from the shock of an attack and are too scared to ask for help in unfamiliar and dangerous situations.
But with SLFORCE, we’ve made it much easier for you to protect yourself in a moment of need by creating SLFORCE Emergency Personal Alarm!

Why SLFORCE Emergency Personal Alarm?

✔ Extremely Loud - 130dB safesound alarm can draw people's attention even at a far distance. It’s as loud as a military jet take-off!

✔ Smart and Compact Design - easy to carry and easily attaches to bag, backpack or purse for quick access

✔ Easy to Use - Just pull the pin out to activate the alarm and insert it back to stop it. The sounds could last 1 hour!

✔ Built-in LED flashlight - for illuminating a dark area, finding a keyhole or looking through your belongings to find an item at night.

✔ A Great Choice for - kids, teenagers, women, elderly, students, joggers, etc. An excellent security option for every age.


Package includes:
1 x Safety alarm
1 x Carabiner clip
1 x User Manual
* Batteries included

100% Money Back Guarantee
We're so sure you'll love the SLFORCE Personal Alarms that we offer a 100% Money Back Guarantee for 6 months. If for ANY REASON you don't like it, we'll refund every cent with no hassle.
feature_bullets: YOUR FAMILY’S SAFETY IS OUR TOP PRIORITY – jogging early in the morning or late at night, having your teenager out at a party late or just talking a late night stroll are all situations where safety is a major concern. With SLFORCE siren song alarm, you can rest assured knowing that your loved ones are protected. A great choice for kids, teenagers, woman, elderly, students, joggers, etc.

AN ATTACKER'S WORST ENEMY IS ATTENTION - a simple and quick solution that requires no thinking! Simply pull on the hand strap to activate a screaming siren of 130 dB - as loud as a military jet aircraft take-off - giving you vital seconds to flee the scene and immediately attract attention. The alarm easily attaches to your bag, keychains or purse for easy access.

LIGHT YOUR WAY TO SAFETY - The night brings the risk of undesirable situations. A good part of your days are spent in the dark, so carrying a light is always a bright idea. Built-in to our keychain security alarm is a mini LED flashlight to keep you safe on a late night dog walk or when unlocking your front door late at night.

PERFECT GIFT IDEA – SLFORCE safesound personal alarm comes beautifully wrapped with a FREE D-Ring carabiner clip. Safe and easy to use, this self-defense keychain alarm makes a fantastic present for any occasion or type of person such as a teenager starting college, Stocking stuffers, Christmas gifts, Black Friday, and Housewarming Parties.

RISK-FREE 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - Your experience with SLFORCE personal alarm is very important to us. At SLFORCE, our professional customer service will do whatever it takes to ensure your satisfaction. Each purchase comes with a 6-month guarantee to ensure satisfaction, no questions asked.
